pursuits.title: Professional Interests
pursuits.headline: Topics of Interest
pursuits.published: Added to the collection on the <blot>xth</blot> Day of <filler><blot>month</blot></filler>, 2026
pursuits.intro: This <str>cabinet of curiosities</str> is where the topics currently sparking my interest and curiosity are 'stored'.
lists: Cloud-native backend development: Building robust backend systems using microservices and container orchestration.
DevOps automation & containerization: Automating CI/CD pipelines with tools like GitHub Actions, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Clean architecture: Implementing architectures designed for long-term code maintainability.

learning.title: What I'm Learning
learning.headline: A Look Into What Fadhil is Learning Right Now
learning.intro: A software developer with an ongoing interest in cloud computing, backend development, and DevOps, is currently concentrating on several technical topics within those domains.
topics: Cloud Native Go - Building Reliable Services in Unreliable Environments
TUI development with Golang Bubble Tea
Competitive programming and various coding interview patterns
learning.outro: “I am ready to apply everything I've learned”
